main_definition: Until indicates a period of time that continues up to a certain point or event, signifying the end of an action or state.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicates continuation of an action until a specified time or event occurs
meanings_and_examples.example: I will continue reading this book until 10 PM.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to show that something did not happen before the mentioned point in time
meanings_and_examples.example: She didn't eat breakfast until she left for work at 8 AM.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Shows a contrast between two different situations or states, with one happening up to a certain event and the other starting after it
meanings_and_examples.example: He was busy until he finished his work, then he went out for dinner.
